verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

"You <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> is <S%G1096>coming,<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is [to be] <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up for <S%G4717>crucifixion.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> in the <S%G833>court<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas;<s%>
and they <S%G4823>plotted<s%> <S%G4823>together<s%> to <S%G2902>seize<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by <S%G1388>stealth,<s%> and <S%G615>kill<s%> [Him.]

But they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Not <S%G1722>during<s%> the <S%G1859>festival,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> a <S%G2351>riot<s%> <S%G1096>occur<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was in <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> at the <S%G3614>home<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G3015>leper,<s%>

a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him with an <S%G211>alabaster<s%> <S%G211>vial<s%> of <S%G927>very<s%> <S%G927>costly<s%> <S%G3464>perfume,<s%> and she <S%G2708>poured<s%> it upon His <S%G2776>head<s%> as He <S%G345>reclined<s%> [at the table.]
But the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G23>indignant<s%> when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3778>[this,<s%>] and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1519>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G684>waste<s%>?
"For <S%G3778>this<s%> [perfume] <S%G1410>might<s%> have been <S%G4097>sold<s%> for a <S%G4183>high<s%> <S%G4183>price<s%> and [the money] <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%>"

But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1097>aware<s%> of this, <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G2873>bother<s%> <S%G3930><s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%>? For she has <S%G2038>done<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%> to Me.
"For the <S%G4434>poor<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> with you <S%G3842>always;<s%> but you do not <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> Me.
"For when she <S%G906>poured<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3464>perfume<s%> upon My <S%G4983>body,<s%> she <S%G4160>did<s%> it to <S%G1779>prepare<s%> Me for <S%G1779>burial.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> is <S%G2784>preached<s%> in the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>woman<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of in <S%G3422>memory<s%> of her."
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> are you <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> me to <S%G3860>deliver<s%> Him up to you?" And they <S%G2476>weighed<s%> out to him <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G694>pieces<s%> of <S%G694>silver.<s%>
And from <S%G5119>then<s%> on he [began] <S%G2212>looking<s%> for a <S%G2120>good<s%> <S%G2120>opportunity<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> on the <S%G4413>first<s%> [day] of <S%G106>Unleavened<s%> Bread the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> do You <S%G2309>want<s%> us to <S%G2090>prepare<s%> for You to <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> into the <S%G4172>city<s%> to a <S%G1170>certain<s%> <S%G1170>man,<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, 'The <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "My <S%G2540>time<s%> is at <S%G1451>hand;<s%> I [am to] <S%G4160>keep<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> at your house with My <S%G3101>disciples.<s%> "'"
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4929>directed<s%> them; and they <S%G2090>prepared<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> He was <S%G345>reclining<s%> [at the table] with the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
And as they were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that <S%G1520>one<s%> of you will <S%G3860>betray<s%> Me."
And being <S%G4970>deeply<s%> <S%G3076>grieved,<s%> they <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to Him, <S%G3385>"Surely<s%> not I, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?"
And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He who <S%G1686>dipped<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> with Me in the <S%G5165>bowl<s%> is the <S%G3778>one<s%> who will <S%G3860>betray<s%> Me.

"The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> [is to] <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> of Him; but <S%G3759>woe<s%> to that <S%G444>man<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%> It would have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> for that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he had not been <S%G1080>born.<s%>"

And <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> who was <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Him, <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3385>"Surely<s%> it is not I, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>?" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You have <S%G3004>said<s%> [it] <S%G4771>yourself.<s%>"

And while they were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> [some] <S%G740>bread,<s%> and after a <S%G2127>blessing,<s%> He <S%G2806>broke<s%> [it] and <S%G1325>gave<s%> [it] to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2983>"Take,<s%> <S%G2068>eat;<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is My <S%G4983>body.<s%>"

And when He had <S%G2983>taken<s%> a <S%G4221>cup<s%> and <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G1325>gave<s%> [it] to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4095>"Drink<s%> from it, <S%G3956>all<s%> of you;
for <S%G3778>this<s%> is My <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> which is <S%G7062>poured<s%> out for <S%G4183>many<s%> for <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

"But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I will not <S%G4095>drink<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G7032>fruit<s%> of the <S%G288>vine<s%> from <S%G737>now<s%> on <S%G2193>until<s%> that <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G4095>drink<s%> it <S%G2537>new<s%> with you in My Father's <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>"
And after <S%G5214>singing<s%> a <S%G5214>hymn,<s%> they <S%G1831>went<s%> out to the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, " You will <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away<s%> <S%G1722>because<s%> of Me <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'I will <S%G3960>strike<s%> <S%G3960>down<s%> the <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> and the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> of the <S%G4167>flock<s%> shall be <S%G1287>scattered.<s%>'
"But <S%G3326>after<s%> I have been <S%G1453>raised,<s%> I will <S%G4254>go<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you to <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>"

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, ["Even] <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> may <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away<s%> <S%G1722>because<s%> of You, I will <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that <S%G3778>this<s%> [very] <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> a <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crows,<s%> you shall <S%G533>deny<s%> Me <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times.<s%>"

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2579>"Even<s%> <S%G2579>if<s%> I <S%G1163>have<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> with You, I will not <S%G533>deny<s%> You." <S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>thing<s%> <S%G2532>too.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> with them to a <S%G5564>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1068>Gethsemane,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2523>"Sit<s%> <S%G847>here<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> I <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>over<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> and <S%G4336>pray.<s%>"
And He <S%G3880>took<s%> with Him <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to be <S%G3076>grieved<s%> and <S%G85>distressed.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "My <S%G5590>soul<s%> is <S%G4036>deeply<s%> <S%G4036>grieved,<s%> to the <S%G2193>point<s%> of <S%G2288>death;<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> and <S%G1127>keep<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%> with Me."

And He <S%G4281>went<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G4281>beyond<s%> [them,] and <S%G4098>fell<s%> on His <S%G4383>face<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it is <S%G1415>possible,<s%> let <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> from Me; <S%G4133>yet<s%> not as I <S%G2309>will,<s%> but as Thou wilt."

And He <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> them <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G3779>"So,<s%> you [men] <S%G2480>could<s%> not <S%G1127>keep<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%> with Me for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>?

<S%G1127>"Keep<s%> <S%G1127>watching<s%> and <S%G4336>praying,<s%> that you may not <S%G1525>enter<s%> into <S%G3986>temptation;<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G4289>willing,<s%> but the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G772>weak.<s%>"

He <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I <S%G4095>drink<s%> it, Thy <S%G2307>will<s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>"
And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> them <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> for their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G916>heavy.<s%>

And He <S%G863>left<s%> them <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> a <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3056>thing<s%> <S%G3825>once<s%> <S%G3825>more.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Are you <S%G3062>still<s%> <S%G2518>sleeping<s%> and <S%G373>taking<s%> your <S%G373>rest<s%>? <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is being <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> into the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G268>sinners.<s%>
<S%G1453>"Arise,<s%> let us be <S%G71>going;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the one who <S%G3860>betrays<s%> Me is at <S%G1448>hand!<s%>"

And while He was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> up, <S%G3326>accompanied<s%> <S%G846><s%> by a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> with <S%G3162>swords<s%> and <S%G3586>clubs,<s%> from the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he who was <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Him <S%G1325>gave<s%> them a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3739>"Whomever<s%> <S%G302><s%> I shall <S%G5368>kiss,<s%> He is the one; <S%G2902>seize<s%> Him."
And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> he <S%G4334>went<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5463>"Hail,<s%> <S%G4461>Rabbi!<s%>" and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> Him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2083>"Friend,<s%> [do] <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G3918>have<s%> <S%G3918>come<s%> for." <S%G5119>Then<s%> they <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G1911>laid<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G2902>seized<s%> Him.

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1614>reached<s%> and <S%G645>drew<s%> out his <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and <S%G3960>struck<s%> the <S%G1401>slave<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> and <S%G851>cut<s%> <S%G851>off<s%> his <S%G5621>ear.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G654>"Put<s%> your <S%G3162>sword<s%> <S%G654>back<s%> into its <S%G5117>place;<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2983>take<s%> up the <S%G3162>sword<s%> shall <S%G622>perish<s%> by the <S%G3162>sword.<s%>

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> do you <S%G1380>think<s%> that I <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3870>appeal<s%> to My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and He will at <S%G737>once<s%> <S%G3936>put<s%> at My <S%G3936>disposal<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3003>legions<s%> of <S%G32>angels<s%>?
<S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> that it <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>happen<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way<s%>?"
